text: McEwens Beach is a coastal town and locality in the Mackay Region, Queensland, Australia. In the , McEwens Beach had a population of 202 people. == History == The area was named as a township by the Queensland Place Names Board on 11 December 1980. == Amenities == The Mackay Regional Council operates a mobile library service on a fortnightly schedule at Aura Street. ==References== Category:Towns in Queensland Category:Mackay Region Category:Coastline of Queensland Category:Localities in Queensland
title: McEwens Beach, Queensland
